description:
"Just cars. That's pretty much my main focus right now. Going fast."
Ah, the life of a hot 22-year-old. Lee goes to the gym, hangs out with his friends, fucks girls, and races cars.
"Me and my friends," he said. "We're big into street racing."
"Ever get busted?" I asked.
"Nah, there's some old roads where I live. Nobody on them. That's were we do it."
"So do you have racing groupies?" I asked.
"What's that?"
"You know, girls who follow you around and watch you race."
"Yeah," he said, smiling sheepishly.
Lee has "three or four" close buddies, but no girlfriend. He's got a bunch of different girls he's fucking, though.
"Do you have sex a lot in your car?"
"Yeah, I love fucking a chick in my car. It's only a two-seater though so it can be tight."
title: Lee
